definitions.definition: Any of four isomeric univalent hydrocarbon radicals, C 4 H 9 , formally derived from butane by the loss of a hydrogen atom.
A synthetic rubber made by the polymerization of isobutylene .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any of four isomeric univalent hydrocarbon radicals, C 4 H 9 , formally derived from butane by the loss of a hydrogen atom.
secondary_definitions: A synthetic rubber made by the polymerization of isobutylene .
